sourcesContent: import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Server } from 'src/app/models/server'; @Component({ selector: 'app-server-options-button', templateUrl: './server-options-button.component.html', styleUrls: ['./server-options-button.component.css'] }) export class ServerOptionsButtonComponent { @Input() server?: Server; showOptions = false; toggle() { this.showOptions = !this.showOptions; } }
